author: Anonymous Gear
title: Worklist 1 and 2 videos
question: Hello, I just wanted to confirm that we are not supposed to watch any videos on Edx past worklist #1? Is this correct?
instructor_answer: Yep! You were expected to watch up to and including Worklist Accumulators 1 last Thursday, DON'T watch Worklist Accumulators 2 :)
